name: hexsnippets
description: Load and share code snippets from a git repo

hexSnippets.repositories.description: List of local git repos containing shared snippets.

name.description: Short label for this repo (for status bar and pick lists).

localRepoPath.description: Path to a local git repo. Can be absolute or relative to the first workspace folder.

snippetsPath.description: Path inside the repo where snippet files live.

includeJsonFiles.description: Also treat *.json files as snippet collections.

enableGitPull.description: If true, run 'git pull' in this repo during sync.

hexSnippets.localRepoPath.description: Path to a local git repo (fallback if repositories[] is not set).

hexSnippets.branch.description: Git branch to pull from (fallback for single-repo mode).

hexSnippets.snippetsPath.description: Path inside the repo where snippet files live (fallback for single-repo mode).

hexSnippets.includeJsonFiles.description: Also treat *.json files as snippet collections (fallback).

hexSnippets.enableGitPull.description: If true, run 'git pull' in the repo during sync (fallback).

hexSnippets.autoSyncIntervalMinutes.description: How often (in minutes) to auto-sync all repos. 0 disables auto-sync.

hexSnippets.debug.description: Enable verbose logging to the Extension Host output.
